messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: I am appalled at the neglect of the Magnus, a once fine school, by the old parties. Ordinary kids should be able to aspire to quality schooling to compete with the best. Likewise Newark has been let down and left behind.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP believes our laws should be made in our own country.
Let us fight the European Arrest Warrant, defend ourselves, have decent local government and have a referendum to get out of Europe which legislates over 70% of our laws.

issues.brexitEurope: Let us fight the European Arrest Warrant, defend ourselves, have decent local government and have a referendum to get out of Europe which legislates over 70% of our laws.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, I am appalled at the neglect of the Magnus...
leaflet.additionalNotes: Believe in Britain. Lets get our country back.
